```{r}
cleandata <- clean_names(ourdata) 
cleandata
```

```{r}
disorders_unique <- cleandata %>% 
  count(disorder_subclass) %>%
  arrange(n)
disorders_unique
```
```{r}
disorders_unique %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = disorder_subclass, y = n )) +
  geom_col(color = "grey", alpha = .8, na.rm = TRUE) +
  labs(title = "Occurance of Disorders",
       x = "Disorder",
       y = "Number of patients") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = rel(1.5), hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
disorders_unique %>% 
ggplot(aes(
  label = disorder_subclass, 
  size = n,
  color = disorder_subclass
  )) +
  geom_text_wordcloud() +
  scale_size_area(max_size = 15) +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
lebers_neuropathy <- cleandata %>%
  filter(disorder_subclass == "Leber's hereditary optic neuropathy") %>%
select(genes_in_mothers_side, inherited_from_father, maternal_gene, paternal_gene)
lebers_neuropathy
```

```{r}
cleandata %>%
  group_by(disorder_subclass) %>%
  summarise(average_bloodcell_count = mean(blood_cell_count_mc_l)) %>%
  arrange(average_bloodcell_count)
```

```{r}
cleandata %>%
   ggplot(aes(x = disorder_subclass, y = blood_cell_count_mc_l)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
cleandata %>%
  group_by(disorder_subclass) %>%
  filter(low_bloodcell_count = blood_cell_count_mc_l < 4) 
```

```{r}
cleandata %>%
  group_by(disorder_subclass) %>%
  filter(!is.na(white_blood_cell_count_thousand_per_microliter)) %>%
  summarise(average_wbc_count = mean(white_blood_cell_count_thousand_per_microliter)) %>%
  arrange(average_wbc_count)
```
